title: Google\Cloud\Speech\V2\RecognitionConfig
name: RecognitionConfig
description:
Provides information to the Recognizer that specifies how to process the recognition request.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.speech.v2.RecognitionConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.auto_decoding_config
params.description: Automatically detect decoding parameters. Preferred for supported formats.

params.name: data.explicit_decoding_config
params.description: Explicitly specified decoding parameters. Required if using headerless PCM audio (linear16, mulaw, alaw).

params.name: data.adaptation
params.description: Speech adaptation context that weights recognizer predictions for specific words and phrases.
